text: Na'ankure kokankokama nemaniza vahe'ma tamagrama rohu'ma zamareta fenozamima eri'naza zantera, nona hu'za osi'a naga'ma ofri mani'naza vahe'mo'za tamagri fenozana eme rohu tamare'za erigahaze. Na'ankure tamagra vahera zamaheta korana eri neragita, mopazmine kumazminena eri haviza nehuta, ana mopafima maniza vahe'enena zamazeri haviza hu'nazagu anara hugahaze.
